com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.css3

Class MozColumnGap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.core.AbstractCssProperty<MozColumnGap>
      • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.css3.MozColumnGap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CssProperty, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class MozColumnGap
extends AbstractCssProperty<MozColumnGap>
     The -moz-column-gap property specifies the gap between the columns.

 Note: If there is a column-rule between columns, it will appear in the middle of the gap.
 Default value:  normal
 Inherited:      no
 Animatable:     yes
 Version:        CSS3
 JavaScript syntax:      object.style.mozColumnGap="50px"
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    WFF
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
